text.__SUMMARY__: Habenaria microceras is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is found in Cameroon and Equatorial Guinea. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests.
text.Sources: Cheek, M. & Cable, S. (2000). "Habenaria microceras". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2000: e.T39578A10249307. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2000.RLTS.T39578A10249307.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
